Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: British Academy Overseas Conference Grant, ref oo100586

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Consulenza free-lance per il training in EViews (offerto a varie istituzioni: ECB, Lloyds TSB, Credit Suisse, BNP Paribas, Goldman Sachs, Ruffer, Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors, etc...)
